TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DecimalType extends System.Object

summary.span: Essa classe foi preterida a partir do Visual Basic 2005.

span.span: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa classe fornece métodos para manipular dados potencialmente representa um `Decimal` valor.This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Decimal` value.
